followed by all 100 active threads...

The page in question does not come close to validating with the W3C's
validator. So I suppose something about that page could be awry. I
notice that it contains a fair number of .swf objects, so I may retry
the crawl with the SWF extractor turned off, though I don't think that
will matter here given we are in the HTML extractor.

I'll try it again and see how far I get. Obviously large crawls work
with Heritrix: I just seem to be cursed. :-)

    -tree
